20101203155251.000|20101203155251.556|CCO|    
20101203155251.556|20101203155252.111|CCO|        [ Female Announcer ]
20101203155252.111|20101203155252.667|CCO|    
20101203155252.667|20101203155253.222|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101203155253.222|20101203155253.778|CCO|    
20101203155253.778|20101203155254.333|CCO|        and some medicines,
20101203155254.333|20101203155254.889|CCO|    
20101203155254.889|20101203155255.444|CCO|          such as Prilosec,
20101203155255.444|20101203155256.000|CCO|    reduce the effect of PLAVIX
20101203155256.000|20101203155256.556|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk
20101203155256.556|20101203155257.111|CCO|
20101203155257.111|20101203155257.667|CCO|    for heart attack and stroke.
20101203155257.667|20101203155258.222|CCO|

20101203155258.778|20101203155259.333|CCO|

20101203155300.444|20101203155301.000|CCO|    to determine treatment.
20101203155301.000|20101203155301.625|CCO|    
20101203155301.625|20101203155302.250|CCO|    Don't stop taking PLAVIX
20101203155302.250|20101203155302.875|CCO|
20101203155302.875|20101203155303.500|CCO|  without talking to your doctor
20101203155303.500|20101203155304.125|CCO|    as your risk of heart attack
20101203155304.125|20101203155304.750|CCO|    
20101203155304.750|20101203155305.375|CCO|    or stroke may increase.
20101203155305.375|20101203155306.000|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101203155306.000|20101203155306.625|CCO|
20101203155306.625|20101203155307.250|CCO|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101203155307.250|20101203155307.875|CCO|    
20101203155307.875|20101203155308.500|CCO|      should not use PLAVIX.
20101203155308.500|20101203155309.125|CCO|    
20101203155309.125|20101203155309.750|CCO|        Taking PLAVIX alone
20101203155309.750|20101203155310.375|CCO|
20101203155310.375|20101203155311.000|CCO|  or with some other medicines,
20101203155311.000|20101203155311.556|CCO|    
20101203155311.556|20101203155312.111|CCO|          including aspirin,
20101203155312.111|20101203155312.667|CCO|
20101203155312.667|20101203155313.222|CCO|    may increase bleeding risk,
20101203155313.222|20101203155313.778|CCO|    
20101203155313.778|20101203155314.333|CCO|        so tell your doctor
20101203155314.333|20101203155314.889|CCO|    
20101203155314.889|20101203155315.444|CCO|      when planning surgery.
20101203155315.444|20101203155316.000|CCO|        
20101203155316.000|20101203155316.556|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101203155316.556|20101203155317.111|CCO|    
20101203155317.111|20101203155317.667|CCO|    all medicines you take,
20101203155317.667|20101203155318.222|CCO|  including aspirin, especially
20101203155318.222|20101203155318.778|CCO|    
20101203155318.778|20101203155319.333|CCO|    if you've had a stroke.
20101203155319.333|20101203155319.889|CCO|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101203155319.889|20101203155320.444|CCO|    
20101203155320.444|20101203155321.000|CCO|      or confusion develops,
20101203155321.000|20101203155322.111|CCO|      tell your doctor promptly.
20101203155322.111|20101203155323.222|CCO|      These may be signs of TTP,
20101203155323.222|20101203155324.333|CCO|    
20101203155324.333|20101203155325.444|CCO|      a rare but potentially
20101203155325.444|20101203155326.556|CCO|
20101203155326.556|20101203155327.667|CCO|    life-threatening condition,
20101203155327.667|20101203155328.778|CCO|    reported sometimes less than
